goals__remit: Independent sugar trader, great number of years experience, belonging to family owned Boettger Group, building bridges between  producers and food industry, providing integrated solutions for our customers, we deliver unrivalled quality of service, providing businesses with an extrasordinary range of sugars, high-quality sugars, organic certified, wide variety of crystal and liquid sugars, clients benefit from overview of the entire market, worldwide delivery, strong and experienced logistics
